docs.lead_paragraph: The current week ought to be called "Corban, it is a gift," by the theatrical people. It is a week of benefits, past, present and to come. Last night "Young New-York" was subjected to a fearful trial, and no doubt many a dashing blade, casually dropped down from Saratoga or Newport, sang with Macheath, ...

headline.main: An American in Palermo--Gossip About Garibaldi, &c.

After telling the story of GARIBALDI'S initiatory campaign, now familiar to every one, he continues as follows: ...

headline.main: The Return of John C. Heenan,; HE COMES WITHOUT A BELT PROSPECT OF A FIGHT WITH MORRISSEY.

docs.snippet: We publish in another column a copy of a memorial, which has just been put into circulation among the taxpayers of New-York, urging the Board of Councilmen to arrest the march of Mayor WOOD towards a pure municipal despotism, by refusing their...
docs.lead_paragraph: We publish in another column a copy of a memorial, which has just been put into circulation among the taxpayers of New-York, urging the Board of Councilmen to arrest the march of Mayor WOOD towards a pure municipal despotism, by refusing their concurrence in the removal of two officers from the Croton Aqueduct Department for "insubordination."

headline.main: The Frauds on the Pacific Mail Steamship Company.; ADDITIONAL CHARGES AGAINST HOFFMAN--INTERESTING AFFIDAVITS, ETC.--THE EXAMINATION POSTPONED UNTIL TUESDAY.

docs.snippet: Mayor WOOD is out with a letter explaining the position in which he stands. His position has long been a standing joke.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mayor WOOD is out with a letter explaining the position in which he stands. His position has long been a standing joke.
